message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE. 

The paper describes the development of a factoid question answering system that combines statistical models and ontology-based methods for the Vietnamese language. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including Computational Linguistics (cs.CL), Information Retrieval (cs.IR), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), Machine Learning (cs.LG), and Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE). However, given the focus on natural language processing and question answering, cs.CL and cs.IR are the most likely categories, followed by cs.AI, cs.LG, and cs.NE.
